sentence.Network_en: The aim of discipline is to teach children to behave acceptably.
sentence.Network_cn: 纪律的目的是教育儿童举止得体。

sentence.Network_en: These exercises will result in your being able to hit the ball quite acceptably.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些训练将会使你能够较好地击中球。

sentence.Network_en: The difficulty is in which way the non - circulating stock can acceptably enter the second order market.
sentence.Network_cn: 全流通的难点 是非 流通股份以何种方式进入市场,才能被二级市场所接受.

entry.def: Acceptable activities and situations are those that most people approve of or consider to be normal.

example.ex: It is becoming more acceptable for women to drink alcohol...
example.tran: 女性喝酒渐渐被人们接受。

example.ex: The air pollution exceeds most acceptable levels by 10 times or more.
example.tran: 大气污染程度超出了普遍认可的标准10倍或更多。

entry.def: If something is acceptable to someone, they agree to consider it, use it, or allow it to happen.

example.ex: They have thrashed out a compromise formula acceptable to Moscow...
example.tran: 他们经过讨论达成了一项莫斯科可以接受的折中方案。

example.ex: They recently failed to negotiate a mutually acceptable new contract.
example.tran: 他们最近未能谈成一个双方都满意的新合同。

entry.def: If you describe something as acceptable, you mean that it is good enough or fairly good.

example.ex: On the far side of the street was a restaurant that looked acceptable...
example.tran: 远处街边有一家饭店看起来还可以。

example.ex: We've made an acceptable start, but it could've been better.
example.tran: 我们起了一个好头，但本可以更好一些的。

means.word_mean: 1. in an acceptable (but not outstanding) manner;

auth_sentence.content: But these acceptably wondrous things are only the half of it.
auth_sentence.res_content: But these acceptably wondrous things are only the half of it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But these acceptably wondrous things are only the half of it.

auth_sentence.content: By the way, I do believe the risks are acceptably low.
auth_sentence.res_content: By the way, I do believe the risks are acceptably low.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: By the way, I do believe the risks are acceptably low.

auth_sentence.content: My observation is that it is used acceptably by gay rather than straight people.
auth_sentence.res_content: My observation is that it is used acceptably by gay rather than straight people.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: My observation is that it is used acceptably by gay rather than straight people.
